BlackNightmare:

The femme smiled and kindly said "did you rest well?"
she hugged him


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice:
>  
> The Hunter stirs, and turns his head toward Blacknightmare.  His 
sensors were being blocked by something in the atmosphere, a minor 
irriatation.  He activated his optics and looked over to the femme 
who seemed to be stirring.
> "Hey," he said with a slight smile.
